ConnectionGenes
public sealed
ConnectionGenes​<T>
where T : struct

Connections genes represented as a structure of arrays (see https://​en​.wikipedia​.org​/wiki​/AOS_and_SOA).  Element i of each array represents a value relating to the 'i'th gene.

Type Parameter
T

Connection weight data type.

Variables
_connArr
public readonly DirectedConnection[] _connArr

Array of directed connections; this describes the network structure.

_weightArr
public readonly T[] _weightArr

Array of connection weights.

Construct uninitialised arrays with the given length.

Parameter

int

Number of connection genes to allocate space for.
